span.span: The Adair Co. R-I School District in Novinger, MO is now accepting applications for a 7-12 Business Teacher for the 2020-2021 school year. The business teacher will be responsible for all business courses including, but not limited to: Computer Applications, Accounting, JH Computers, Personal Finance, Graphic Design, Entrepreneurship (Yearbook) and Business Management. The successful candidate will be expected to serve as the FBLA Adviser. Adair Co. R-I is a small, rural school district located in Northeast Missouri. The district operates on a 4-day school week, Tuesday through Friday, with one Monday a month for professional development opportunities in the district being held. Applicants must possess a valid Missouri teaching certificate. You may find the link to the application and the listing on Missouri Teaching Jobs below.
